content: इतर {%<ab>pron. a.</ab>%} (रा|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}|--रत्|{%<ab>n.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Another, the other (of two), the remaining one of the two; इतरो दहने स्वकर्मणां <ls>R. 8. 20</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--2@} The rest or others (<ab>pl.</ab>). {@--3@} Other than, different from (with <ab>abl.</ab>); इतरतापशतनि यथेच्छया वितर तानि सहे चतुरानन <ls>Udb.</ls>; इतरो रावणादेष राघवानुचरो यदि <ls>Bk. 8. 106.</ls> {@--4@} Opposite of, either used by itself as an adj. or at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>; जंगमानीतराणि च <ls>Rām.</ls>; विजयायेतराय वा <ls>Mb.</ls>; सुलभेतरसंप्रयोगां <ls>M. 5. 3</ls> opposite of, other than easy, difficult; so दक्षिण° left; वाम° right &c. {@--5@} Low, mean, vulgar, ordinary; इतर इव परिभूय ज्ञानं मन्मथेन जडीकृतः <ls>K. 154</ls>, <ls n="K.">160</ls>, <ls n="K.">203</ls>, <ls n="K.">273.</ls> इतर-इतर the one-the other, this-that.
